org.fujion.core

Class RequestUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.core.RequestUtil

  • public class RequestUtil
extends Object
    Utility methods for dealing with servlet requests.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getRequest

        public static javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest getRequest()
        Return current HttpServletRequest. Note that this will return null when invoked outside the scope of an execution/request.
        Returns:
        HttpServletRequest, null when invoked outside the scope of an Execution/ServletRequest
        See Also:
        RequestContextHolder.currentRequestAttributes()

      • getSession

        public static javax.servlet.http.HttpSession getSession()
        Return current HttpSession
        Returns:
        HttpSession, null when invoked outside the scope of a servlet request

      • getSession

        public static javax.servlet.http.HttpSession getSession(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request)
        Return current HttpSession given request.
        Parameters:
        request - Servlet request object.
        Returns:
        HttpSession or null if none present.

      • logHeaderNames

        public static void logHeaderNames()
        Logs at trace level the request headers

      • getServerName

        public static String getServerName()
        Return server name.
        Returns:
        server name
        See Also:
        ServletRequest.getServerName()

      • getLocalHostAddress

        public static String getLocalHostAddress()
        Return local host IP. Note: HttpServletRequest#getLocalAddr() doesn't seem to be consistent. This method uses java.net.InetAddress.
        Returns:
        server IP
        See Also:
        InetAddress.getHostAddress()

      • getRemoteAddress

        public static String getRemoteAddress()
        Return client's ip address. Returns null if invoked outside scope of a servlet request.

        This considers header X-FORWARDED-FOR (i.e. useful if behind a proxy)

        Returns:
        the client's IP

      • getBaseURL

        public static String getBaseURL(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Returns the full base URL for the servlet.
        Parameters:
        request - The servlet request.
        Returns:
        The full base URL.

      • getResourceURL

        public static URL getResourceURL(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Returns the resolved URL of the servlet request path.
        Parameters:
        request - The servlet request.
        Returns:
        The resolved URL.

      • getResourceURL

        public static URL getResourceURL(String path)
        Returns the resolved URL for the specified path.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to resolve.
        Returns:
        The resolved URL.

      • getSessionId

        public static String getSessionId()
        Get current request's session id or null if session has not yet been created or if invoked outside the scope of an Execution/ServletRequest.
        Returns:
        String representing session id or null if session has not yet been created

      • assertRequest

        public static javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest assertRequest()
        Return request, throwing IllegalStateException if invoked outside the scope of an Execution/ServletRequest
        Returns:
        HttpServletRequest
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if called outside scope of an HttpServletRequest
